info.description: **FastAPI**, **SQLAlchemy** and **Redis** helps you do awesome stuff. 🚀
info.summary:
This backend project is FastAPI template.
     This project serves as the backend, which aims to provide a robust and
     reliable system to its users.
       This backend application plays a crucial role in providing the
     functionality for user authentication, real-time monitoring,
      data processing, and advanced alerting system. It is designed to ensure
       the scalability and maintainability of the mobile app,
        making it a vital part of the overall solution.
info.title: fastapi-boilerplate

get.description:
Redirects the user to the /docs endpoint for API documentation.
## Response:
- `return:` **The redirected response**
- `rtype:` **RedirectResponse**

post.description:
Endpoint to handle user login with OAuth2 authentication using
 request form.
## Parameter:
- `user:` **Request body with username and password**
- `type:` **OAuth2PasswordRequestForm**
## Response:
- `return:` **Token information with access token, its type and
 refresh token**
- `rtype:` **TokenResponse**

Add the user's token to the blacklist database
## Parameters:
- `:param authorization:` **The access bearer token as authorization string
in the header**
- `:type authorization:` **str**
 ## Response:
- `return:` **Message object**
- `rtype:` **Msg**

parameters.description: The access bearer token as authorization string in the header

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** authorization token object that works correctly.

parameters.name: authorization

schema.description: The access bearer token as authorization string in the header
schema.title: Authorization

post.description:
Endpoint to handle password recovery.
## Parameter:
- `email:` **Path parameter that references the email used to recover
 the password**
- `type:` **EmailStr**
## Response:
- `return:` **Message object**
- `rtype:` **Msg**

parameters.description: The email used to recover the password

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** email object that works correctly.

parameters.name: email

schema.description: The email used to recover the password
schema.title: Email

post.description:
Generates a refresh token for the current user and saves it to the
 database
 ## Response:
- `return:` **Token information with access token, its type and
 refresh token**
- `rtype:` **TokenResponse**

Endpoint to handle password reset.
## Parameter:
- `token_reset_password:` **Body Object with token and new password**
- `type:` **TokenResetPassword**
## Response:
- `return:` **Message object**
- `rtype:` **Msg**

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** token payload object that works correctly.

schema.description: Object with access token and new password
schema.title: Body object

post.description:
Endpoint to validate an access token.
## Response:
- `return:` **The authenticated user instance**
- `rtype:` **UserAuth**

get.description:
Retrieve all users' basic information from the system using
 pagination.
## Parameters:
- `:param skip:` **Offset from where to start returning users**
- `:type skip:` **NonNegativeInt**
- `:param limit:` **Limit the number of results from query**
- `:type limit:` **PositiveInt**
## Response:
- `:return:` **List of Users retrieved from database**
- `:rtype:` **UsersResponse**

converted.description: FastAPI can convert skip `strings` to actual `numbers` automatically

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** skip query parameter that works correctly.

converted.description: FastAPI can convert limit `strings` to actual `numbers` automatically

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** limit query parameter that works correctly.

post.description:
Register new user into the system.
## Parameter:
- `:param user:` **Body Object for user creation.**
- `:type user:` **UserCreate**
## Response:
- `:return:` **User created with its data**
- `:rtype:` **UserCreateResponse**

converted.description: FastAPI can convert phone number `strings` to actual `numbers` automatically

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** user create object that works correctly.

get.description:
Retrieve the current user's information.
## Response:
- `:return:` **Response object for current user**
- `:rtype:` **UserResponse**

delete.description:
Delete an existing user given their user ID.
## Parameter:
- `:param user_id:` **Unique identifier of the user to be deleted**
- `:type user_id:` **UUID4**
## Response:
- `:return:` **Json Response object with the deleted information**
- `:rtype:` **Response**

parameters.description: ID of the User to be searched
parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: ID of the User to be searched
schema.title: User ID

get.description:
Retrieve an existing user's information given their user ID.
## Parameter:
- `:param user_id:` **Unique identifier of the user to be retrieved**
- `:type user_id:` **UUID4**
## Response:
- `:return:` **Found user with the given ID.**
- `:rtype:` **UserResponse**

parameters.description: ID of the User to be searched
parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: ID of the User to be searched
schema.title: User ID

put.description:
Update an existing user's information given their user ID and new
 information.
## Parameters:
- `:param user_id:` **Unique identifier of the user to be updated**
- `:type user_id:` **UUID4**
- `:param user_in:` **New user data to update that can include:
 username, email, first_name, middle_name, last_name, password,
  gender, birthdate, phone_number, city and country.**
- `:type user_in:` **UserUpdate**
## Response:
- `:return:` **Updated user with the given ID and its data**
- `:rtype:` **UserUpdateResponse**

parameters.description: ID of the User to be searched
parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: ID of the User to be searched
schema.title: User ID

converted.description: FastAPI can convert phone numbers `strings` to actual `numbers` automatically

invalid.summary: Invalid data is rejected with an error

normal.description: A **normal** user update object that works correctly.

get.description:
Check the health of the application backend.
